description: This script manages the start, stop, restart, and initialization of the 'wecb' service functionality, including handling specific network events and system properties. It is used for controlling a service called 'wecb_master' on embedded devices, with conditional logic based on device type and manufacturer.

methods.name: service_start
methods.description: Starts the 'wecb_master' service if certain network conditions are met, sets up related script and process management.

methods.name: service_stop
methods.description: Stops the 'wecb_master' service and unregisters it from process monitoring.

methods.name: service_init
methods.description: Performs initialization tasks related to multicast MAC configuration; currently only outputs a message.

methods.name: handle_ipv4_status
methods.description: Handles IPv4 status changes and starts or stops the service accordingly based on network status.
